article_title: Under Obamacare, Risks Grow for High-Margin Drug Stocks

article_metadata.description: After seeing my favorite “2014 top pick” biotech stock rewarded last week with a 500% rally, I’m scouring the market looking for the next dramatic pipeline catalyst. But despite plenty of candidates, a less forgiving reimbursement environment may mean the days of 90% margins on life-saving drugs may be winding [...]
article_metadata.author: Hilary Kramer
